reviews.sentence: Excellent place for weekend stay. The staff here was vey friendly and accommodating the valet staff was helpful and attentive. Dining room bar was great to have very good food and easy to find. Room was clean and comfortable. Will definitely stay again next trip to Chattanooga.

Rockin southern hospitality. My family snuck away for a little family fun getaway and this hotel rocked and the reason why. the people. Talk about excellent front line service. At the end we were all hugs with the staff the suite was very spacious. We will be back for sure.

Great Hotel. This hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly and helpful. The room was excellent and quiet the air conditioning was fantastic and the food quality at both breakfast and lunch was great. I would definitely stay at this hotel in the future when i travel to Chattanooga. Easy check in and check out nice pool nice and close to everything walking distance from the baseball stadium and many great resturants for dinner.

Friendly staff perfect loc walked everywhere. Summer vacation. The hotel staff was very friendly helpful. Nice pool. Clean modern room w comfy beds. The location was perfect as it was a very short walk to restaurants coffee shops and the TN Aquarium a must see. A couple block walk to the pedestrian bridge for a spectacular view of the river riverfront. Cross the bridge to enter Coolidge Park beautiful park with large fountain area for kids to splash around carousel rides and lots of green space. So much to do see all within walking distance from the hotel. Great stay overall.

Love this hotel. Huge room great for families. Try to get a room at the end of the hallway family room and bedroom is separated by the foyer making it huge. Great buffet breakfast. Free cookies at checkin are amazing. Super helpful and friendly staff.

Paris Hilton. figures should have known. it was available. Starbucks in the lobby. Staff gave me great advise about third party booking type sites. Live and learn. Through this site asked for two beds got one. Crap view of AC units cramped compared to a Mariot. Smelled like my UGA dorm room. And lacks in elevator capacity. No service elevator so you are always riding with cleaning equipment. Very poor property for the price. At 260 you are getting into theRitz Carlton rates. Should have stayed across the street at the Holiday Inn or called the Mariot direct. Not enough parking spaces where one must use the valet to see their cheesy hand out. I expected more from the famous Hilton. Two bad booking experiance in a row. First was two weekend ago in Franklin Tn. Thank God for Holiday inn express. Traveling Volybal. So you know my needs. I am exclusive Mariot when possible.

Weekend getaway. The stay was nice location with in walking distance to everything. I also noticed that everyone from the valet to the front desk to housekeeping was friendly helpful up beat. The only downside was the elevators were up down causing it to be a 5 7 min wait at one point.

Location is great. Staff was Super friendly and exceedingly helpful. Would recommend again and again. The young lady that checked us in and assisted Merlana apologies if misspelled as well as Zach during checkout deserve special attention. This property was busy busy and they were stellar in customer service. Bravo to this hotel for having great associates.
Excellent place to stay centrally located to many great restaurants and the staff here are very friendly.

Friendly staff very clean slow elevators. Beautiful hotel in the heart of downtown. The staff was amazing and the room although small was very comfortable and clean. The valet service and front desk staff were very excellent and helpful. My wife ended up getting sick during our stay and they gave us a robe and extra bottles of water for her. Only negatives were that the elevators took forever. there is only two and we never waited less than 5 minutes. We also requested extra towels for our room by phone and they never brought us any. We also requested a room with a bath tub but they could not accommodate us. Besides that everything was excellent.

Too much money for two sleples nights. the smallest most over priced and overheated room with the noisiest air conditioning ever. Room is tiny even for European standards and at 325 a night one would at least expect to be able to sleep without earplugs. But with its sun exposure and air conditioner noisy when it wa new and not serviced in a while your choice is between sauna windows can not be opened or the noise of a starting 747. Receptionists do not know the floor plan positive interpretation or make it their goal to give you what you did not ask for negative interpretation. I asked for a quiet rook far away from the ice machine and they gave me the room next to the elevator and the ice machine.

Nice stay. Comfy beds and pillows. Clean space. Nice pool area with some relaxing chairs. Service was friendly although we did have to wait quite a while to check in due to a line and only one person seemed to be at the desk. The warm cookies at check in are a nice touch though. Having the coffee snack shop was nice but it is only open for limited hours the hotel location is within walking distance to some good food and coffee shops. We walked to the aquarium with our toddler just a short easy walk and all over the city which was great. There was the option to self park which we prefer and that was closely located and made it easy to drive to a place when needed.

Friendly Staff. Staff were very friendly and helpful. They tried and tried to get our WIFI working on the 8th floor but I think that we were just in a bad location. That was disappointing. Building alarms went off three times during our stay but that is really out of the control of the staff. However the staff should have been better trained to know whether guests were to leave the property during the alarm and when to re enter. Instead we were all left on our own with no one from the property taking leadership responsibilities. The location of the hotel is good for walking downtown in any direction. Excellent cookies too.

Staying at the Doubletree has been very nice. The workers are friendly and helpful if you are in need. There was an issue with loud high scholers late at night and the front desk resolved the issue quickly and efficiently. The Eleven Restaurant is very tasty but I would recommend trying somewhere else for breakfast as the menu is limited to a few items and an 11 buffet.

This place is wonderful they have valet parking everything at your fingertips service goes above and beyond what you would expect. The only thing I did not like was the price of room service that was way to high other then that I would recommend this place to you.
Nice place. Everything was great except there was only 2 elevators for the staff and guest.

The reception staff where fantastic my little boy lost his bear which we could n’t find and he was clearly upset. The girls at reception sent a new bear to the room along with a packet of biscuits and a small note from them. It was a lovely touch. The hotel is in a great location for exploring and the breakfast was great The staff at this hotel go the extra mile and really do look after their customers. What a great stay and experience.

Staying in the middle of town was awesome but the service at the counter to help with things to do around town was awesome as well it is my wife and my 1 year anniversary. so we just somehow worked it into the conversation late evening when we returned a guy showed up at our door with cake saying they heard it was our anniversary nothing in which by us was planned well worth the stay with all the amenities and service. Would highly recommend for anybody visiting Chattanooga.

Nice hotel very modern. a bit pricey. Nice hotel situated close to similar hotels very modern and new looking features. The in hotel starbucks needs some improvements and training for staff. I stayed in a room just below the suite level of rooms and it was to me a bit small for the price range. The tv needs mounted higher on the wall instead of at the same level as the bed you have to completely set up in bed to watch anything also there is not an active channel guide so you never know what is on anyways. The lights in the rooms need a dimmer or just dimmer bulbs it is impossible to turn on a light in the room without waking a partner. be prepared to pay for parking also 11 per night and 15 for valet. Hotel is situation in good distance from local attractions and restraunts.

Nice stay Great location. Pool. It was nice. Not heated. But still nice. Nice only a few items that we did not like. The bed was not as comfortable as we would have hoped. The TV was difficult to try to figure out the channels. Lastly the cleaning staff did not clean room garbage etc. when we were there.

Clean with great options but bed lacking. We had a 2 day stay for liesure. Enjoyed the location. The Staff was great and used the Shuttle for a few short trips close. Enjoyed the in house bar but did nt partake at the restaurant even though full service was offered for additional cost. The bed in the room was the only disappointment. It was old and sunken in the middle and not very comfortable for 2.
